member_var.var: SELECT CA.CATCCOURSECD ,CA.CAEPNUMTYPE ,CA.CAEPALPHATYPE ,CA.CAITEMNO ,CA.CACORRECTCNT ,CA.CAITEMSCORE ,CA.CACORRECTANSWER FROM CORRECTANSWER CA ,(SELECT APTCCOURSECD ,APNUMTYPE ,IIF(APALPHATYPE='1','A',IIF(APALPHATYPE='2','A',IIF(APALPHATYPE='3','A',APALPHATYPE))) AS APALPHATYPE FROM ANSWERPAPER GROUP BY APTCCOURSECD, APNUMTYPE, IIF(APALPHATYPE='1','A',IIF(APALPHATYPE='2','A',IIF(APALPHATYPE='3','A',APALPHATYPE))) ) AP WHERE CA.CATCCOURSECD = AP.APTCCOURSECD AND CA.CAEPNUMTYPE = AP.APNUMTYPE AND CA.CAEPALPHATYPE = AP.APALPHATYPE ORDER BY CATCCOURSECD, CAEPNUMTYPE, CAEPALPHATYPE, CAITEMNO
